name: Swipe Heroes - The Endless Medieval Gauntlet
name_original: Swipe Heroes - The Endless Medieval Gauntlet
description:
"A fun game that we're going to have to remember how to defeat certain opponent as we go through" - dailyappshow.com

"Age of Swipe takes the swipe gesture to a new level." rating 3.8/5 - app-or-not.com

“This game can be truly addictive, especially if you get the hang of it.” - iphonekicks.com

“Overall a good app” rating 4/5 – averageappreviews.co



"Swipe Hero" is an action/arcade game which uses swipe gestures to control the player's actions instead of using conventional buttons and arrows. Player will battle an unending wave of randomly spawned enemies, each with different kind of weakness which player will have to remember each one of them in order to survive. The game is really fun and easy to play.


REMEMBER, REFLEX, EXECUTE
Test your memory! try to remember all of the enemy's weakness. Not enough with that, try kill them while under limited time frame.

DIFFERENT COMBOS
8 different kind of attack from various combination of swipe.

UTILIZE THE SWIPE GESTURE
Forget arrows and buttons. All command in this game uses the swipe gesture. Swipe up, down, left or right to execute commands.

NO BRAINER
Its a free game, nothing hold you back from playing this game.
you can even download and play it now!
No IAPs at all.
